website_summaries.verdict: The Sennheiser Urbanite XL is a well-designed, dynamic-sounding Bluetooth headphone that works well with a lot of music -- but not quite everything.
pros: The Sennheiser Urbanite XL Wireless is a well-designed, comfortable over-ear wireless headphone that offers exciting, dynamic sound with quality bass.
Battery life is strong at 25 hours of music playback
features highlights include dual microphones, touch controls and aptX support
cons: has a tendency to make songs that have a grittier edge sound harsher

customer_reviews.title: Pads are very easy to remove
customer_reviews.text: 1. Headphones are smaller than HD600 series so they won't go snuggly around ears as HD600 does. 2. Pads are very easy to remove, so you should be careful if you wear them around your neck from time to time (pads can fall off). Apart from this headphones connect and work well with different Bluetooth devices (phones, laptops). Sound is quite good. New: 3. When you remove headphones without turning them off they sometimes make phone to redial last number. In short this touch interface suxx. 4. When you wear a hoodie it sometimes causes touch interface on headphones to do stuff as well. AVOID.
customer_reviews.author: P. Krupets

customer_reviews.title: Loved them but cheap all plastic headband cracked
customer_reviews.text: No complaints on sound and comfort. Really liked these and would have recommended UNTIL....... I went to put them on today and heard a crack. Right where the headphone part is screwed to the head band it cracked. I couldn't believe it. I can not believe for $150 there is not a metal insert inside the headband but only a plastic piece. What a joke. Putting metal screws into plastic at a stress point is always a great idea right. Nope it isn't. Very disappointing to say the least. All the great sound and comfort are useless if they are cheaply constructed and now unwearable. Fail. Maybe thats why they discontinued them.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Fatal flaw in the headband causes breakage near the ear cup.
customer_reviews.text: I really, REALLY wanted to love this headset! I love the styling. I love the buttonless touch control. I love the sound quality. But the headset has one fatal flaw: the headband snapped under normal use. I put them on one morning to find the ear cup dangling. Didn't even last 30 days. Come on, Sennheiser! We know you can do better. We WANT you to do better. Oh, and while you're at it, please also make a wireless, on-ear version that is NOT "XL". You know, the same form factor you already produce for the wired (non-BT) Urbanite headset. Fix those two things and I'll buy a set right now!
customer_reviews.author: ev

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: High quality headphones! Pros: These appear to be very high quality. The headband is padded. The touch controls are a bit touchy but like anything, you just need to adapt and they will become second nature. They look really nice. They are very comfortable. Cons: I could not seem to get the sound balanced. Without an equalizer they were not bass heavy but they seemed muffled. With an equalizer the highs never seemed to have clarity, almost as if the headset was faulty. Verdict: I returned them as I did not like the sound. Why four stars? Maybe they were faulty.
customer_reviews.author: just review it!

customer_reviews.title: Confounding
customer_reviews.text: This was hard to use with two Bluetooth devices simultaneously. Using the touchpad to start/stop a movie or audio track on laptop or tablet would automatically call the recorded phone number on my phone, whether I had answered it or not. Had 3 awkward conversations especially when one of them was a telemarketer I ignored. I’m using 3 generations of Apple devices with the headphones (2013 MBP / 2015 iPhone 6s Plus / 2018 11” iPad Pro). I had to return the headphones despite the fact they sounded great, especially for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Robloo

customer_reviews.title: yup its great
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, Bluetooth that sounds good ??? HAHAHAHAHAHA YEAH RIGHT!!! .......i have to say im sorry Sennheiser ...... i should have never doubted you, man you folks hit it out the box they are a little bass heavy but other than that they are with out a doubt sounding better than the competitions wired offerings one of the best buys Ive made in while ...hell i take them everywhere now i never knew how annoying wires were till i went wireless
customer_reviews.author: ITsTheXFactor

customer_reviews.title: The Urbanites XL's were not very comfortable and the sound was unimpressive
customer_reviews.text: I was not a fan of these. I ended up returning them and purchasing the Sennheiser Momentum 2.0 Over the ears. The Urbanites XL's were not very comfortable and the sound was unimpressive. I was expecially dissapointed in the bass. I don't particularly like huge bass but these were lacking. Overall, these were just not worthy of the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Works, but required some bluetooth/driver troubleshooting on my PC.  Ear pads don't stay on.
customer_reviews.text: Have had some driver / bluetooth issues with my Windows 10 Lenovo PC, but in the end works. You may need to experiment with a few bluetooth adapters and drivers. Also, the ear muff pads keep falling off during any travel... not impressed. Good comfort and sound quality though. Edit: 18 months later. The ear pad surface material is disintegrating onto my face... Gross.
customer_reviews.author: JohnPatrck

customer_reviews.title: Earpads will fall off for you, too!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and bluetooth functionality is nice, no complaints. But, and as many reviews have noted - THE EAR PADS FALL OFF WAY TOO EASILY! And, they take minutes of concentrated effort to put back on. Really quite a nuisance and a time burner -- especially to the point of me feeling the need to write this review. I always keep them in the case provided and move them gently from place to place -- and they still happen to fall off. So, if you buy these headphones, expect with high certainty they'll fall off for you too. I haven't tried using a hard casing for the headphones.... that could work.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Myers

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones, and if your like me and don't listen to music turned up all the way the battery last for awhile Update, I've had these for almost a year now, they are durable, no signs of damage, and they do get thrown around a bit, bag to bag. The head band can be bent flat once released it goes back to original shape, battery life is still great.
customer_reviews.author: John Boehler

customer_reviews.title: Ear pads that fall off and are a pain to re-install is the weakest link.  A tighter head fit would be nice too.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but ear pads keep falling off as others have noted and loose fitting (and I wear a 7 1/2 inch men's hat). I feel the ear pads are the weakest link in the system and I expected much better from Sennheiser for the price. Fairly comfortable but not super comfortable. Check out the offerings from JBL, Sony and Bose. The Senn's did not live up to my expectations. I would have returned had the ear pads issue surfaced while it was still returnable. I plan to replace soon. Bluetooth connection however is flawless, no complaints there. Frankly, I would pass on this model.
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality/depth is terrible. The software provided by the manufacture offers no adjustment. There is practically no base boost. The only way to enable your mic is over bluetooth. The bluetooth sound quality is terrible / garbled, even 2 feet away from your receiver. I would not buy these again. This is an abomination coming from a reputable brand like sennheiser.
customer_reviews.author: adam denis lafreniere

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: These are sweet. I have had them for some time now. Great sound, good for everything from Audio Books, Podcasts, to your favorite music. Controls can be sensitive. I have turned them off by accident too many times to count. Other than that they are Bueno ! Not cheap but they won't break the bank either. I think they are better than the previous Bose set I was using.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Giersch

customer_reviews.title: HiFi Bliss in a Crowd of Imitators
customer_reviews.text: While the controls are little touchy in wireless mode, and wired lacks bass (not that it is utilized often), this is the headset to own. The bass is good in wireless mode, comfortable, has great range and allows good noise isolation for travel. Battery life is good depending on sustained volume, charges fairly quickly, the design is rigid and feels sturdy. Audio quality is fantastic for a wireless headset, especially in a world of wannabes (looking at you Beats). This is a solid choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Shaw

customer_reviews.title: They might look like they're big or blocky but they feel lightweight and ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got them today. So far the quality is insane! The bass is unbelievable, especially for Headphones that are wireless and with a 25 hour battery life. They might look like they're big or blocky but they feel lightweight and the gel filled head rest on the band makes the headphones feel like they're barely there. They can get pretty loud and not lose any quality. I set them up with my Laptop and the audio quality was like I was in the theater. These are by far the best headphones I've ever had. I own the Bose Soundlink Bluetooth headphones and this pair kicks it's ass and with no competition
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these for the legendary Sennheiser quality and to ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for the legendary Sennheiser quality and to use it for my shared office space. The Bluetooth hand-off works well with my iPhone and Cisco VOIP phone. I work with a few Audiophiles and they have all been impressed. One unexpected feature is the extremely long battery life, I typically get 2 - 3 work days without charging.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.text: My lord these are absolutely amazing for modern music. Hiphop, r&b, ect. And they hold their own in this price range for classic rock and acoustics as well. Definitely a better sound quality than beats. Better build. And theyre comfortable (BUT i have small ears if your ears are big they probably wont fit over ear for you)
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I'm not terribly experienced, so this is based on demoing other similarly priced headphones at stores.These are great headphones for the cost. Nice balanced sound. They fit my ears just barely, so are pretty comfortable for me (6' man with "average sized" head and ears). I find the touch interface to be very intuitive and have yet to accidentally do something I didn't mean to do. My only real issue with the touch pad is that it's not as responsive as I would like (~1s delay for commands on my Galaxy S7). I can't comment on durability as I've only owned them a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Efr450

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones, but I almost deducted a star due to the touch sensitive side. I'm constantly dropping calls inadvertently by bumping it and when I want it to work it is difficult. Volume works fine, but pausing and playing music is hit and miss. But they sound great, Mic pickup is good, charge lasts several hours, and they are quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rinker

customer_reviews.title: Best sound from best headphone manufacturer.  Design flawed
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous sound that you would expect from Sennheiser. Easy to use, charge, adjust volume, and has a microphone. The design is problematic. These are VERY large headphones, and they are more for listening when you are standing or sitting in one position. Also the ear cup / pad came off after a month. It can be fixed but it was a disappointment. Sennheiser is my favorite but did not like this model, which I got for my husband for a holiday gift.
customer_reviews.author: latertater

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the headache
customer_reviews.text: After using these headphones for over half a year, I found that the touch controls have grown to be significantly wonky, sometimes pausing/unpausing my media repeatedly without anything touching the interface. The battery life and sound quality has held up over time, but the touch controls are so buggy on these headphones after normal use that it's simply not worth purchasing. I'd stay away from these headphones and pursue options with more reliable technology.
customer_reviews.author: DeVon Lineman

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones though the stock pads aren't the best
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones though the stock pads aren't the best... I replaced them with HM5 velor pads and it makes them WAY more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set of bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set of bluetooth headphones. They sound amazing for bluetooth headphones. Keep in mind that bluetooth will lose fidelity/quality of sound vs. wired/analog connection. When you keep that in mind, these bluetooth headphones are great and the battery life is also equally impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. They are a little large on my head. Sound cancelling ability is amazing. Volume controls by swiping the side is awesome! The only gripe I have is the padded foam donut that makes contact with your ears sometimes falls out. Still very happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed in the quality of the headphones
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed in the quality of the headphones. I've had the headphones less than a month and one of the ear muffs fell off and is now gone. I didn't realize they were so poorly put together that you have to watch it all times less a piece fall off them and be lost forever. The sound quality was good up to that point. Little trouble with the Bluetooth when walking around outside, sometimes it was skip or scratch when walking.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzalo Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, painful to wear.
customer_reviews.text: These sound decent. A little low on bass for headphones targeted at beats. They pair easily. Touch controls are difficult to use, constantly input the wrong thing or play/pause by accident. Biggest issue is comfort. The earpods slide very easily on the headband so the headband doesn't hold them up. The tops of my ears do and they hurt after 15 min. Earcups also become painful after 30 min. Wasn't able to finish a complete album. Will be returning and getting something else.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Parker

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: Returned. The Bluetooth would not work. The headset is wonky. Keeps falling down, after adjusted. It is a shame because Sennheiser has always had a great reputation for quality sound and product.
customer_reviews.author: Radioactivegurl2

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Comfortable Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are the single nicest headphones I have ever used. They're so comfortable. I don't know what materials were used but they keep your ears from feeling fatigued. The cups fit fully around my ears. Quick and easy to connect. Sound quality is about as good as it gets for BT tech Only thing is, they were a little large on me and the smallest setting still left the headband loose from the top of my head.
customer_reviews.author: K. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones with really good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones with really good battery life. Indicated 23h use time on a charge, and I consistently listen to them for 12+h a day at work with no discomfort. Pairs to both my laptop (with 4.0 dongle, stock BT chipset wouldn't pair) and my phone for easy switching between calls and music. Only thing I'd change is the touch buttons on the sides. it's really easy to hit the hangup/stop button when adjusting them on your head.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade for me.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded my beats to this Sennheiser, I travel a lot and always needs a good headset so i can sleep well. The noise cancellation feature works really well. Very nice build. Only thing i would suggest improvement is the touch control. It's not very responsive sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Honestly

customer_reviews.title: good sound. I was looking for a larger than ...
customer_reviews.text: Really made well; good sound. I was looking for a larger than normal ear cup, as I wear BTE hearing aids and need the hearing aid to be "in" the ear cup. Other headphones that had smaller cups created feedback from the cup resting against the hearing aid microphone. These cups are a bit bigger, and my hearing aid doesn't produce feedback. Will recommend to others with BTE hearing aids.
customer_reviews.author: K. W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones. Sound Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: These sound great, and the velour pads are quite comfy. The suede covered headband is a nice touch too. The unique touch controls will take some learning, but it's a unique concept.
customer_reviews.author: Gary T. Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphone quality, build, and bass.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing with great sound quality and a very solid build. They seem like a very premium set of headphones and fit comfortably around my ears. The only negative would be the sensitive touch controls but they still work well. All in all, very happy with my purchase and would recommend these to any bass lover.
customer_reviews.author: AgenZ

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones A+++
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones I've ever had!! Their sound and bass are amazing!! For me they afe better than the beats, they are more user friendly, higher quality sound and bass and the battery lasts for ever and if it runs out you can still us an aux cable and it will work, I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Alfonzo

customer_reviews.title: The ears will hurt and earbuds will fall
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound and mic. Unfortunately, the earpads are falling quite a bit even when taking them out of the case. Also, after a long usage (3+ hours), my ears hurt (dull pressure), probably due to small diameter of earpads. Replacements earpads are $20-40 and the cheaper (non-Sennheiser) last for a few months only.
customer_reviews.author: Merzi

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless headset I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless headset I have ever had. Good bass too. Music clarity is very good, not the best from Sennheiser, but for no cords excellent. Did not work with my PS4 or Linux system (UPDATE: works with Debian now except for the mic.), hence one star, but if you do not have either of those you should have no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Parrdacc

customer_reviews.title: SOUND AND CONNECTIONS WERE GREAT BUT THEY WERE HEAVY AND HURT MY EARS
customer_reviews.text: SOUND AND CONNECTIONS WERE GREAT BUT THEY WERE HEAVY AND HURT MY EARS! HAD SENNHEISER WIRELESS 3.5 120'S AND THEY WERE SO COMFORTABLE FOR YEARS BUT NOT THESE!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Miner

customer_reviews.title: i love the sound and being able to operate it with ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery time is not 25 hours as advertised. After listening for 15 hours and turning it back on it would not work. Also, the forward/rewind functions are not seamless, since you have to tap very fast, otherwise the commands result in different results from the ones you expect. On the plus side, i love the sound and being able to operate it with two or three gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: cprada726

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the best thing I've ever gotten on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are AWESOME!!! they are super comfortable even for my big head, and they have beautiful sound. Easy to set up, and they come with a headphone cable so you can listen via analog if you don't have bluetooth, or if you want to charge while listening.
customer_reviews.author: iPad Addict

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting battery asn comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound and comfortable, do not regret purchasing this only thing I dislike are the touch controls.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel E.

customer_reviews.title: You won't forget you're wearing it
customer_reviews.text: I have wide variety of music genres in my music collection, but I mostly listen to 90s rock, metal, and trash, as well as Japanese rock and pop. I found the sound rich and full, with just enough bass. Based on most reviews I read, I thought there would be too much bass, but I can say it's just right, and the sound is balanced. I love the design of these headphones. It's has an understated feel to it that I absolutely love. It definitely feels well-built, but you'll notice it when you're wearing it, given its heft and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best head set ever
customer_reviews.text: Best head set ever! I like Bose and they are a decent set but this one is excellent for the price. Never will I buy Beats by dre, all it is about looks, no long term use, durability is questionable as my past two didn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Most Customer

customer_reviews.title: She wanted something stylish with great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my mother. She wanted something stylish with great sound quality. She loves them. The only issue was the touch functionality is awkward at first but after a while it is very simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I've has these for about 2 months now and I could not be more happy. These headphones not only met but exceeded my expectations. Pros: Really comfortable sound is impeccable, bass is great not to loud but not to soft. The Bluetooth connectivity is awesome. (I can walk around my house without them disconnecting) Cons: I only have one con, when the headphones are connected via Bluetooth, I find myself accidentally pausing a song because of the controls on the right cup of the headphones. It takes some getting used to but other than that, these are some amazing headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Guillen

customer_reviews.title: cushion pads came off immediately
customer_reviews.text: poor quality on the casing for sennheiser - the cushion pads came off several times, especially during travel inside the pouch and they're so hard to put back on I finally gave up on them. Too late to return, otherwise...
customer_reviews.author: G. Corellano

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. I replaced the earpads for better fit.
customer_reviews.text: Without going into everything like the other reviews, these are good. Good sound, good construction, good battery life. One issue I had was that earpads were too small for my ears, causing fatigue when wearing for extended periods. I bought the Brainwavz HM5 Velor Memory Foam pads to replace them. The fit is snug, so it took some effort to attach them to the headphones, but I'm confident they won't fall off. They are not as attractive as the stock pads, but they fit my ears a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: I liked the product
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I liked the product, looked quality, and finally met my expectations. Arrived before time well done. jeki namer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great fit and good range
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great fit and good range. Easy to connect to several devices. A little heavy and a little confusing learning the touch pad operations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good sound, terrible controls. constant redials
customer_reviews.text: the headphones themselves work fine. the problem is the controls. they're set up so that taking the headphones on and off can and has frequently redialed my phone. most recently, it dialed 911 on a redial. the actual control surfaces are unmarked - design over function, i suppose.
customer_reviews.author: C. cooney

customer_reviews.title: Sound is really good, but still does not go around all they ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound is really good, but still does not go around all they way on my ears because of the round shape, maybe a more natural form of ear will do, or someone with small ears, I don't have big ears so.. Sound quality is great, high level material and they look really good.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Honestly... one of the best!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent headphones, I can wear this all day. Bluetooth works perfect. Impressive sound quality, I love the volume touch control, ear pads are very soft, you can pair many devices on this headphones.
customer_reviews.author: RC Racing

customer_reviews.title: There is a lot to like about these headphones
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot to like about these headphones. Great sound with really nice bass. The touch controls on the ears were easy to operate and a nice feature. Unfortunately for me these were extremely uncomfortable. They were heavy and had little padding on the headband which was very obvious due to the weight. Too bad by otherwise these are a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality - but ear cuffs pop off easily
customer_reviews.text: A great quality headset. Connects quickly via Bluetooth. I would rate this a 5 star only if the ear cuffs didn't call out so easily and as often as it should for being a high quality expensive product. It is annoying to put back as well were you have to finesse it in with a gentle touch.
customer_reviews.author: Greg P.

customer_reviews.title: The best I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing headphones of some kind or another since my first SONY walkman sometime in the early 80s. Sennheiser's wireless Urbanite XLs are simply the best pair I've ever owned of any kind--wired or wireless, over-the-ear or ear bud. Granted I've never spent this much on a set before, but they deliver to my complete satisfaction in all respects: sound, comfort, durability of design, and style. I LOVE THESE THINGS.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Borst

customer_reviews.title: Amazing battery life
customer_reviews.text: I slammed these things in a steel door and they came out with a small scratch. Amazing battery life, fair warning when battery is running low, great sound quality, not too heavy in the head. Only minor complaint is the cushions come off just a bit too easy but not enough to not recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Bradley McCormick

customer_reviews.title: There pretty good a little to much money then what their ...
customer_reviews.text: There pretty good a little to much money then what their worth. I would say their more like 250 headphones. They are comfortable and durable. the battery life is great. the only downside is the sound bleeds a bit from the headphones. if that does not that bother you then theses are the one for you. Personally I'm pretty happy with these headphones also they look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Octavio Ontiveros

customer_reviews.title: Sound is perfect, love how they go over my ear
customer_reviews.text: Sound is perfect, love how they go over my ear. Better then beats, they are a little big though. Great sound though.
customer_reviews.author: Kamil

customer_reviews.title: poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I expected too much from $150. phones, but when wired into my laptop, the sound was very disappointing. Much poorer than an old pair of Bose phones I plugged in next. Tricked out bass overkill and no sense of space. They are being returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I Thought
customer_reviews.text: It has cool features as well as playing really nice sound
customer_reviews.author: Tay_Stey

customer_reviews.title: I love them. They don't fit over the entire ear ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a splurge. I love them. They don't fit over the entire ear like some I've tried. None the less, they are extremely comfortable. The sound is very good. So simple to connect to multiple device.
customer_reviews.author: Cths

customer_reviews.title: Unless you are the size of a toddler, there ...
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are the size of a toddler, there is no way these should be considered "over-ear" headphones. Didn't even bother testing quality because the size was so blatantly misrepresented especially for an "XL" version.
customer_reviews.author: Purpleplushies

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: Don't like accidentally pausing my music when I stretchmy arms or put my hands behind my head, but they get great signal reception, the battery lasts more than a workday (with heavy use), and they sound good to me. Not noise-cancelling, but I can't hear anything else after the music starts.
customer_reviews.author: Tony McClung

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound and crazy long battery life. The touch-pad controls get bumped a lot though. It bugs me that everyone thinks touch-pad user interfaces are the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: J. Valeski

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: Two major complaints. First, these do not play loud, I expected them to at least match my sons $30 Sony’s, but not even close. Second is the touch feature is really sensitive, very hard to adjust them without muting, skipping etc.
customer_reviews.author: A.S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice but the extra ear muffs I ordered are way to small. That's my only disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Joel T.

customer_reviews.title: An excellent headphone. However the USB cable is a little ...
customer_reviews.text: An excellent headphone. However the USB cable is a little short.
customer_reviews.author: Tim F. Drevyanko

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones I've ever bought.  PERIOD.
customer_reviews.text: The Sennheiser Urbanite XL headphones are the best pair of over-the-ear headphones I've ever bought. EVER. Great frequency response, wonderful design, fantastic build quality, amazing battery life. I couldn't ask for much more. AWESOME JOB, Sennheiser!
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset, wish I'd bought it sooner
customer_reviews.text: I work on a headset almost all day and try to listen to music when I'm not on calls. These are comfortable, with good call quality. They're comfortable and light enough that my neck doesn't hurt from wearing them, but they're substantial enough to isolate outside sounds. Sound quality is incredible - far better than anything I've used so far.
customer_reviews.author: Warp Ed

customer_reviews.title: Wireless sound quality is awful!
customer_reviews.text: Wireless sound quality is worse than cheap wired headphones. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Sound Quality with a fatal flaw
customer_reviews.text: While I love the sound quality on these, the earpads are crazy difficult to put back on, and they pop off fairly easily. Prepare for them to pop off roughly once a week. It takes me on average an hour and a lot of contorting of my fingers to get them back on. Hugely frustrating to the point I would say don't buy these, and find ones that aren't so difficult to replace. There are numerous guides showing how to replace the earpads, and all of them are heavily edited to not show how frustrating this process is, or show the presenter going through several trys to get them back on.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Could be louder but Great headphones all in all
customer_reviews.text: The overall sound is really great. I thought the bass would hit a bit harder, but it hits just hard enough to round these headphones out well. These get 4 stars for being stylish, comfortable, and sounding awesome. 1 star lost because I wish the sound would go up one more level, to really get down when my song comes on.
customer_reviews.author: Gainzter

customer_reviews.title: Regardless of the fact that it took a week or ...
customer_reviews.text: Regardless of the fact that it took a week or two for the headphones to fit my head without causing anymore discomfort, these ones are excellently made and very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Meowtwo

customer_reviews.title: For the price I paysd I was a little disappointed. I was hoping for louder volume and a ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price I paysd I was a little disappointed. I was hoping for louder volume and a better quality base but atill exceptional. These make for very nice headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, very comfortable to wear, steady Bluetooth connection. Minus one star for earpads, attaching them can be challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Evgeniy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit tight but everything else is great...Great sound, great build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lionel

customer_reviews.title: Buy them
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headfones I've ever owned. Light, battery lasts a lot longer than beats wireless. Buy these and then buy them again
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: I don't have 10 minutes to waste every time I use it
customer_reviews.text: The earpads keep falling off. I don't have 10 minutes to waste every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ren

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described quality headphones
customer_reviews.text: Sweet headphones sound is good wireless but really shines on usb. Also these will charge while listening over usb so bonus!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Weber

customer_reviews.title: Ear pads fall off very easy
customer_reviews.text: I like them but the ear pads come off way to easy when they are off your ears you dont even know they have fell off and the replacements are 40 bucks which is ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: My First Pair of Quality Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love em! The bass is strong but never overpowering — the overall balance is fantastic. Using them wireless doesn't seem to diminish the sound quality. Plus, they have a 15hr battery life!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but the audio cord sucks.
customer_reviews.text: Love them ... The audio cord that comes with them didn't work with my iPhone 6 at all.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth controls are way too sensitive. Works well with wire. Sound quality is really good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Liking the long battery life. Maybe would need more b-a-s-s but that's probably just me. I mean, these are first high-quality earphones I've ever bought... and I guess I've used to bass it. Sound IS as good as one can expect from mp3's. Earphones can start to feel uncomfortable after a long period of continuous wear. Anyway, best deal in the price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones I've bought in a decade
customer_reviews.text: I own a lot of headphones. The Urbanite XL has great sound quality, unbelievable battery life, and they are very comfortable. Hypersensitive touch controls take a bit of time to learn, but you get used to it. Touch controls don't merit a star deduction. Wicked cans!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Teen musician, audiophile dad & artist friends all said "YES!"
customer_reviews.text: Bought for teen. Cool enough according to peers? check...many raves. Comfortable on larger head? check. Battery good? check. Audiophile father approves? double-check. Even her dad said they were excellent. Don't expect $700 headphones. But I too listened in and the range was great, bass came through without ear bleed; I would tweak the high end a tick, but that can be done with an app, b/c it might be the wireless element. I couldn't afford to make a mistake, and I didn't lose with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: They're really uncomfortable to wear with spectacles. Couldn't wear ...
customer_reviews.text: They're really uncomfortable to wear with spectacles. Couldn't wear them for longer than 3 hours. Returning them today. Didn't expect this from Sennheiser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cannot clear pairing
customer_reviews.text: I have not been able to clear pairing. If I can eventually accomplish this, I'll increase my rating.
customer_reviews.author: jatw

customer_reviews.title: Very good headphones. Bought the wireless option as an afterthought ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good headphones. Bought the wireless option as an afterthought and glad I did. Very convenient. Battery life is very good and the life indicator that shows up on the phone is a nice feature. Sound delivers as expected. Product well built and robust. Have not had any problems with the "touch pad" feature for start, stop, etc. that other's have commented upon. The feature is working as advertised for me. Did notice that the phones are a little unbalanced, one side heavier than the other. Likely where the battery is located?
customer_reviews.author: uddiver

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones, nice sounds last a long time my only thing is i have a galaxy note 4 and the controls are hard to navigate with the phone , it works better with i phone that's why i give 4 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome headphones....great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones!!! Great sound. Havent tried the wireless calling yet, but the wireless music sounds great too. Definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: A Buhay

customer_reviews.title: Like it.
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy, touch is not very convenient but sound is smooth and realistic. Like it.
customer_reviews.author: alik1006

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work great for watching tv with wife who doesn't need the volume as load as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Design, but Hard on the Ears (physically)
customer_reviews.text: These headphones worked as advertised. They even sound quite good. I wanted to like them. They are well-designed and the build quality is pretty good. And I already own a pair of Sennheiser on-ear phones. These were supposed to be an upgrade, but the only thing I couldn't get past is the small ear cups and the fact that the pads are too soft. This means your ears are cramped and squished against the drivers. I could not wear them for long before my ears started to hurt. Sadly, I returned them. If you have small ears, you may like them.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer Extraordinaire

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, frustrating to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised how dissatisfied I am with this product given its relatively high ratings - maybe I got a lemon, but the problems seem integral to the design. Difficult to use, volume control inoperable, pads that pop off when you look at them, are really easy to lose, and then are quite difficult to reinstall. Has something changed with the manufacturing that has harmed the quality? I accidentally left them on the airplane and when the airline called to let me know, I said, "Don't bother sending them to me, they aren't worth the effort."
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: I use these 8 hours a day at work to drown out chatter and focus. Sound quality is great (for bluetooth). Thankfully it comes with a cable to listen to without battery use. The ear cups have a fabric feel and do NOT feel good with sweat. For sitting at a desk they're great. But I wouldn't use these if you are working out or sweating in general. Only "problem" is the touchpad on the right ear cup is super sensitive. When it works it's great but accidentally pausing, skipping songs or even redialing (if connected to a phone) is a pain. But for the price and what you get it's worth it. Very premium feel. Sturdy yet flexible headband.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: UNRELIABLE AND CHEAPLY MADE
customer_reviews.text: the bluetooth doesnt always work the ear cups fall easily and way too overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones I've bought
customer_reviews.text: By far the best head phones I have purchased. Sound quality is amazing. I have a wide range of music from rap, screamo, country, house, orchestra, etc. all sounds amazing and not washed out. Will take awhile to get used to touch sensors on right side of headphones but 100% worth it and worth the money spent. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING. i love Sennheiser products
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. i love Sennheiser products! super happy with my new headphones. super comfertable, and the battery life is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: William Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Easily met my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Easily met my expectations. I feel like the pads could be just a hair's breadth wider, but overall - these things are comfortable and easy to use with a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: crowtales

customer_reviews.title: since I feel like they were kind-of tight on my ears
customer_reviews.text: Only thing preventing 5 stars is if the ear-cups were larger, since I feel like they were kind-of tight on my ears.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Burgwardt

product_meta.title: Sennheiser 506087 Urbanite XL Wireless, Black (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingSennheiser's stylish new over-ear URBANITE XL WIRELESS headphones deliver massive bass with clear treble for a club sound on the move. Superb sound quality is maintained over Bluetooth wireless by using the latest apt-X codec. The XL-size, ultra comfortable, earpads help block out external noise to enhance the listening experience. Cutting-edge wireless technologies including Bluetooth 4.0 and NFC offer supreme ease of use, allowing wireless pairing and multi-connectivity for simultaneous connections to two devices at once. The headphone includes state-of-the-art intuitive touch control panel on the ear cups. Battery life is rated at 25 hours for long listening sessions. The URBANITE XL WIRELESS is built tough delivering exceptional durability with a robust and stylish foldable design.
feature_bullets: Wireless Freedom - Bluetooth 4.0, NFC, voice prompts, 3-way-calling, multi-connectivity. Connectivity Technology: Wireless
CD-quality audio - featuring the apt-X codec, the Urbanite XL Wireless can connect wirelessly to any Bluetooth apt-X-enabled device
Simple to use - intuitive touch control panel on ear cup and convenient connection with two devices simultaneously (phones and computers)
Hours of use - 25h of music without recharging, 15 days of stand-by time
Peace of mind - 2-years international warranty when purchased from an authorized Sennheiser dealer
